phenomena.name: Cigar UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Elongated cylindrical craft reported since the 1940s

phenomena.name: Close Encounter Fifth Kind
phenomena.brief_description: Human-initiated direct communication with extraterrestrial life forms.

phenomena.name: Close Encounter of the First Kind
phenomena.brief_description: Visual sighting of a UFO within 500 feet

phenomena.name: Close Encounter of the Second Kind
phenomena.brief_description: UFO encounter with physical effects on environment or witnesses

phenomena.name: Close Encounter of the Third Kind
phenomena.brief_description: UFO encounter involving observation of occupants or entities

phenomena.name: Colares UFO Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1977 Brazilian island incident with alleged UFO attacks leaving burn marks.

phenomena.name: Crop Circle
phenomena.brief_description: Large patterns formed in fields of crops claimed as UFO messages or landing marks.

phenomena.name: Cross-shaped UFO
phenomena.brief_description: UFO in the shape of a cross or plus sign, reported occasionally worldwide

phenomena.name: Cube UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Rare cubic or rectangular shaped UFO sightings.

phenomena.name: Cylindrical UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Long cylindrical or tube-shaped craft, distinct from cigar UFOs by their uniform width

phenomena.name: Diamond UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Diamond-shaped craft, notably involved in the 1980 Cash-Landrum incident

phenomena.name: Disk with Dome UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Classic flying saucer shape with a raised dome on top, the Adamski-type configuration

phenomena.name: Draconian
phenomena.brief_description: Reptilian beings allegedly from Draco constellation, described as hostile.

phenomena.name: Egg-shaped UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Oval or egg-shaped UFO craft.

phenomena.name: Flatwoods Monster Entity
phenomena.brief_description: Tall entity with glowing face and spade-shaped head observed near a crashed UFO in Flatwoods, WV

phenomena.name: Flying Saucer
phenomena.brief_description: Disc or saucer-shaped UFO, the most iconic flying object type popularized in the mid-20th century.

phenomena.name: Foo Fighters
phenomena.brief_description: Mysterious glowing objects encountered by WWII pilots, described as balls of light.

phenomena.name: Ghost Rockets
phenomena.brief_description: Hundreds of sightings of silent, low-flying rocket-like objects in Scandinavia in 1946.

phenomena.name: Gimbal UFO
phenomena.brief_description: 2015 encounter filmed by USS Roosevelt pilot showing rotating disc-like UAP

phenomena.name: GoFast UFO
phenomena.brief_description: 2015 Navy pilot footage of small fast-moving UAP with no visible propulsion or exhaust

phenomena.name: Grey Alien
phenomena.brief_description: Small humanoid beings with grey skin, large heads, and black eyes

phenomena.name: Gulf Breeze UFO Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1987-1988 Florida incident with claimed UFO photographs later proven to be hoax.

phenomena.name: Hat-shaped UFO
phenomena.brief_description: UFO shaped like a hat or Saturn with a ring-like structure around its equator

phenomena.name: Hessdalen Lights
phenomena.brief_description: Unexplained light phenomena in Hessdalen valley, Norway, observed since 1930s.

phenomena.name: Hexagonal UFO
phenomena.brief_description: UFO with hexagonal or honeycomb-like surface structure

phenomena.name: Hybrid Alien
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged human-alien hybrid beings, central to many abduction narratives involving genetic programs

phenomena.name: Insectoid Alien
phenomena.brief_description: Alien beings resembling large insects, particularly ants or beetles, often reported alongside greys

phenomena.name: JAL 1628 Flight Incident
phenomena.brief_description: November 1986 Japan Airlines cargo flight encounter with three objects over Alaska.

phenomena.name: Jellyfish UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Translucent, jellyfish-shaped aerial objects with trailing tendrils observed by military

phenomena.name: Kenneth Arnold Sighting
phenomena.brief_description: June 1947 sighting by pilot Kenneth Arnold that coined the 'flying saucer' term.

phenomena.name: Levelland UFO Case
phenomena.brief_description: 1957 multiple reports of egg-shaped UFO causing vehicle engine failures near Levelland, Texas

phenomena.name: Light Formation UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Groups of lights moving in coordinated formation, often reported in large numbers

phenomena.name: Lonnie Zamora Socorro Incident
phenomena.brief_description: April 1964 Socorro police officer sighting of egg-shaped craft with occupants.

phenomena.name: Lubbock Lights
phenomena.brief_description: 1951 formation of lights seen by multiple Texas Tech professors and photographed over Lubbock, Texas

phenomena.name: Lyran
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged root race from Lyra constellation, progenitors of other humanoid species.

phenomena.name: Mantis Beings
phenomena.brief_description: Tall insect-like beings resembling praying mantises

phenomena.name: Maury Island Incident
phenomena.brief_description: June 1947 claimed UFO sighting with subsequent men in black visitation, widely considered a hoax.

phenomena.name: Men in Black
phenomena.brief_description: Mysterious figures in black suits who allegedly harass UFO witnesses

phenomena.name: Metallic Sphere UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Highly reflective metallic spheres frequently reported in military airspace and near nuclear sites

phenomena.name: Montauk Project
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged secret military project involving time travel and UFO research.

phenomena.name: Nazca Lines
phenomena.brief_description: Ancient Peruvian geoglyphs theorized by some to be UFO landing strips.

phenomena.name: Nimitz Encounter
phenomena.brief_description: 2004 encounter between USS Nimitz carrier group pilots and Tic Tac-shaped UAP off San Diego coast

phenomena.name: Nordic Aliens
phenomena.brief_description: Human-like extraterrestrials with blonde hair and Nordic features

phenomena.name: O'Hare Airport UFO Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 2006 sighting of disc-shaped object hovering over Gate C17 at Chicago O'Hare International Airport

phenomena.name: Orb UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Spherical or ball-shaped luminous objects

phenomena.name: Pascagoula Abduction
phenomena.brief_description: 1973 abduction of two fishermen by robotic beings on the Pascagoula River in Mississippi

phenomena.name: Pentagon UFO Videos
phenomena.brief_description: Official US Navy fighter jet footage of unidentified aerial phenomena.

phenomena.name: Philadelphia Experiment
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged 1943 military experiment claimed to make ship invisible, widely debunked.

phenomena.name: Phoenix Lights
phenomena.brief_description: Mass UFO sighting over Phoenix, Arizona on March 13, 1997

phenomena.name: Pleiadian
phenomena.brief_description: Humanoid beings claimed to originate from the Pleiades star cluster.

phenomena.name: Project Blue Book
phenomena.brief_description: US Air Force official UFO investigation program from 1952-1969.

phenomena.name: Pyramid UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Pyramid-shaped UFO reported in various sightings worldwide.

phenomena.name: Rendlesham Forest Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1980 UFO encounters near RAF Woodbridge in Suffolk, England

phenomena.name: Reptilian Aliens
phenomena.brief_description: Reptile-like humanoid beings reported in UFO and conspiracy contexts

phenomena.name: Rod-shaped UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Rod or stick-shaped UFO sometimes seen in slow-motion video analysis.

phenomena.name: Roswell Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1947 crash of unknown object near Roswell, New Mexico

phenomena.name: Shag Harbour Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1967 crash of unknown object into Shag Harbour, Nova Scotia, investigated by Canadian military and RCMP

phenomena.name: Shape-shifting UFO
phenomena.brief_description: UFOs that appear to change shape during observation, splitting, merging, or morphing

phenomena.name: Sirian
phenomena.brief_description: Humanoid beings from planets orbiting Sirius, often aquatic-featured.

phenomena.name: Stephenville UFO Sightings
phenomena.brief_description: 2008 mass sighting of enormous silent craft near Stephenville, Texas confirmed by radar data

phenomena.name: Tall Grey Alien
phenomena.brief_description: Taller 5-7 foot grey beings that appear to hold authority over the smaller greys

phenomena.name: Tall White Alien
phenomena.brief_description: Tall, pale-skinned humanoid extraterrestrials sometimes confused with Pleiadians.

phenomena.name: Tehran Incident
phenomena.brief_description: September 1976 Iranian F-4 fighter jet encounter with UFO that disabled instruments.

phenomena.name: Tic Tac UFO
phenomena.brief_description: Oblong, white, wingless craft famously encountered by USS Nimitz pilots in 2004

phenomena.name: Trans-medium UFO
phenomena.brief_description: UFO capable of traveling between air and water, recent term classification.

phenomena.name: Travis Walton Abduction
phenomena.brief_description: 1975 abduction of logger Travis Walton in Arizona, one of best-documented abduction cases with multiple witnesses

phenomena.name: USS Omaha UFO Encounter
phenomena.brief_description: 2019 USS Omaha encounter with spherical UFO that appeared to enter the ocean without slowing

phenomena.name: Varginha UFO Incident
phenomena.brief_description: January 1996 Brazilian incident involving UFO crash and creature sightings.

phenomena.name: Venusian
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged beings from Venus, central to 1950s contactee movement, notably the Valiant Thor case

phenomena.name: Westall Incident
phenomena.brief_description: 1966 Australian incident with over 200 school witnesses seeing UFO over Westall High School.

phenomena.name: Zeta Reticulan
phenomena.brief_description: Grey aliens believed to originate from Zeta Reticuli star system.

phenomena.name: Shadow Person
phenomena.brief_description: Dark humanoid figure seen in peripheral vision or during sleep paralysis

phenomena.name: Hat Man
phenomena.brief_description: Specific shadow person wearing a wide-brimmed hat or fedora

phenomena.name: Poltergeist
phenomena.brief_description: Type of haunting characterized by physical disturbances like objects moving

phenomena.name: Apparition
phenomena.brief_description: Visual manifestation of a deceased person or spirit

phenomena.name: Residual Haunting
phenomena.brief_description: Haunting where events replay like a recording without awareness

phenomena.name: Intelligent Haunting
phenomena.brief_description: Haunting where entity appears aware and can interact with living

phenomena.name: Old Hag Syndrome
phenomena.brief_description: Entity perceived during sleep paralysis, often sitting on chest

phenomena.name: Black-Eyed Children
phenomena.brief_description: Children with entirely black eyes who request entry to homes or vehicles

phenomena.name: Doppelganger
phenomena.brief_description: Ghostly double of a living person, often considered an omen

phenomena.name: Banshee
phenomena.brief_description: Female spirit from Irish folklore whose wail foretells death

phenomena.name: EVP
phenomena.brief_description: Unexplained voices captured on electronic recording devices

phenomena.name: Orbs
phenomena.brief_description: Spherical anomalies captured in photographs, sometimes considered spirits

phenomena.name: Demon
phenomena.brief_description: Malevolent supernatural entity, often from religious traditions

phenomena.name: Phantom Hitchhiker
phenomena.brief_description: Ghostly figure who hitchhikes before mysteriously vanishing from the vehicle

phenomena.name: Phantom Ship
phenomena.brief_description: Ghostly ship seen sailing, often associated with disaster or death

phenomena.name: Remote Viewing
phenomena.brief_description: Ability to perceive distant locations or events through psychic means

phenomena.name: Precognition
phenomena.brief_description: Ability to perceive future events before they occur

phenomena.name: Telepathy
phenomena.brief_description: Direct mind-to-mind communication without physical means

phenomena.name: Psychokinesis
phenomena.brief_description: Ability to move or affect objects using only the mind

phenomena.name: Past Life Memory
phenomena.brief_description: Memories of events from a previous incarnation or lifetime

phenomena.name: Crisis Apparition
phenomena.brief_description: Apparition of a person at the moment of their death or crisis

phenomena.name: Automatic Writing
phenomena.brief_description: Writing produced without conscious control, attributed to spirits or subconscious

phenomena.name: Tulpa
phenomena.brief_description: Entity created through focused thought and meditation

phenomena.name: Near-Death Experience
phenomena.brief_description: Profound experience reported by those who nearly died or were clinically dead

phenomena.name: Shared Death Experience
phenomena.brief_description: Experience where living persons share aspects of a dying person's transition

phenomena.name: Sleep Paralysis
phenomena.brief_description: State of being conscious but unable to move, often with hallucinations

phenomena.name: Time Slip
phenomena.brief_description: Experience of briefly traveling to or glimpsing another time period

phenomena.name: Missing Time
phenomena.brief_description: Period of time for which a person has no memory, often associated with UFOs

phenomena.name: Glitch in the Matrix
phenomena.brief_description: Experience suggesting reality is a simulation with occasional errors

phenomena.name: Mandela Effect
phenomena.brief_description: Phenomenon where many people share the same false memory

phenomena.name: Spontaneous Human Combustion
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged phenomenon where a human body ignites without external source

phenomena.name: Ball Lightning
phenomena.brief_description: Unexplained atmospheric phenomenon of luminous spherical objects during storms

phenomena.name: Crop Circles
phenomena.brief_description: Patterns created by flattening crops, often of unknown origin

phenomena.name: Cattle Mutilation
phenomena.brief_description: Unexplained deaths and precise surgical removal of tissue from livestock

phenomena.name: Skinwalker Ranch
phenomena.brief_description: Utah property known for numerous paranormal phenomena reports

phenomena.name: Bermuda Triangle
phenomena.brief_description: Region in the Atlantic where ships and aircraft allegedly disappear mysteriously

phenomena.name: Out-of-Body Experience
phenomena.brief_description: Experience of consciousness separating from the physical body

phenomena.name: Infrasound Effects
phenomena.brief_description: Physiological effects of sound frequencies below human hearing range

phenomena.name: Electromagnetic Hypersensitivity
phenomena.brief_description: Alleged sensitivity to electromagnetic fields causing various symptoms

phenomena.name: Temporal Lobe Epilepsy
phenomena.brief_description: Neurological condition that can produce vivid visions and spiritual experiences

phenomena.name: Endogenous DMT Theory
phenomena.brief_description: Theory that the brain produces DMT naturally, causing paranormal experiences

phenomena.name: Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
phenomena.brief_description: Toxic gas exposure causing hallucinations often mistaken for hauntings

phenomena.name: Narcolepsy
phenomena.brief_description: Sleep disorder causing sudden daytime sleep and hallucinations

phenomena.name: Charles Bonnet Syndrome
phenomena.brief_description: Condition where visual loss causes complex hallucinations

phenomena.name: Migraine Aura
phenomena.brief_description: Visual disturbances preceding migraine headaches

phenomena.name: Hypoxia-induced Hallucinations
phenomena.brief_description: Hallucinations caused by low oxygen levels in the brain

phenomena.name: Tinnitus
phenomena.brief_description: Perception of sound in the absence of external noise

phenomena.name: Pareidolia
phenomena.brief_description: Tendency to perceive familiar patterns in random stimuli

phenomena.name: Apophenia
phenomena.brief_description: Human tendency to see connections between unrelated events

phenomena.name: Hypnagogia
phenomena.brief_description: Transitional state between wakefulness and sleep with vivid experiences

phenomena.name: Sensory Deprivation Effects
phenomena.brief_description: Hallucinations and perceptual anomalies from sensory isolation

phenomena.name: Ganzfeld Effect
phenomena.brief_description: Altered perception from uniform sensory stimulation

phenomena.name: Ideomotor Effect
phenomena.brief_description: Involuntary movements made without conscious intention

phenomena.name: Visual Snow Syndrome
phenomena.brief_description: Visual phenomenon resembling television static covering entire visual field

phenomena.name: Phantom Sounds
phenomena.brief_description: Unexplained sounds or voices perceived without external source

phenomena.name: Angels
phenomena.brief_description: Spiritual beings reported in religious traditions and personal encounters

phenomena.name: Djinn
phenomena.brief_description: Supernatural beings from Islamic and Arabian mythology

phenomena.name: Fairies and Fae Folk
phenomena.brief_description: Supernatural creatures from European folklore and mythology

phenomena.name: Marian Apparitions
phenomena.brief_description: Reported sightings and encounters with the Virgin Mary

phenomena.name: Stigmata
phenomena.brief_description: Spontaneous appearance of Christ's wounds on the body of believers

phenomena.name: Demonic Possession
phenomena.brief_description: Belief that evil spirits or demons inhabit and control the human body

phenomena.name: Miracles
phenomena.brief_description: Events attributed to divine intervention defying natural law

phenomena.name: Incorruptible Saints
phenomena.brief_description: Bodies of saints that allegedly do not decompose naturally

phenomena.name: Resurrection Appearances
phenomena.brief_description: Encounters with deceased individuals after their death

phenomena.name: Voodoo and Spiritual Practices
phenomena.brief_description: African-derived spiritual practices involving supernatural elements

phenomena.name: Astral Projection
phenomena.brief_description: Deliberate practice of separating consciousness from the body

phenomena.name: Tarot and Divination
phenomena.brief_description: Practice of using cards to divine future events and spiritual insights

phenomena.name: Scrying and Crystal Gazing
phenomena.brief_description: Practice of gazing into reflective surfaces to receive visions

phenomena.name: S√©ances and Mediumship
phenomena.brief_description: Gatherings to contact spirits and receive messages from the deceased

phenomena.name: Dowsing
phenomena.brief_description: Practice of using divining rods to locate hidden substances or water

phenomena.name: Ley Lines
phenomena.brief_description: Hypothetical lines of mystical energy connecting sacred sites

phenomena.name: Aura Reading
phenomena.brief_description: Claimed ability to perceive and interpret energetic fields around bodies

phenomena.name: Ouija Board
phenomena.brief_description: Board game designed to facilitate communication with spirits

phenomena.name: Pendulum Divination
phenomena.brief_description: Use of a hanging weight to answer yes/no questions and divine information

phenomena.name: Akashic Records
phenomena.brief_description: Esoteric belief in a cosmic record of all events and knowledge

phenomena.name: Lucid Dreaming
phenomena.brief_description: State of being aware of and controlling one's dream state

phenomena.name: Shamanic Journeying
phenomena.brief_description: Spiritual practice of entering altered states to communicate with spirit realms

phenomena.name: Holotropic Breathwork
phenomena.brief_description: Breathing technique designed to induce altered states of consciousness

phenomena.name: Float Tank Experiences
phenomena.brief_description: Altered consciousness achieved through sensory isolation in salt water tanks

phenomena.name: Meditation-induced Visions
phenomena.brief_description: Spiritual experiences and visions arising from deep meditative states

phenomena.name: Psychedelic Experiences
phenomena.brief_description: Altered consciousness states induced by psychedelic substances

phenomena.name: Hypnotic Regression
phenomena.brief_description: Hypnotic technique to access memories and experiences

phenomena.name: Binaural Beat Effects
phenomena.brief_description: Auditory illusion and neurological response to frequency differences

phenomena.name: D√©j√† Vu
phenomena.brief_description: Sensation of having experienced a current situation before

phenomena.name: Jamais Vu
phenomena.brief_description: Sensation of unfamiliarity with a situation that should be known

phenomena.name: Depersonalization/Derealization
phenomena.brief_description: Dissociative state where person feels detached from body or reality

phenomena.name: Dissociative Fugue
phenomena.brief_description: Dissociative state involving travel and loss of identity

phenomena.name: Cotard Delusion
phenomena.brief_description: Delusional belief that one is dead or decomposing

phenomena.name: Capgras Syndrome
phenomena.brief_description: Delusional belief that a loved one has been replaced by an impostor

phenomena.name: Alice in Wonderland Syndrome
phenomena.brief_description: Neurological condition causing distorted perception of body size and space

phenomena.name: Folie √† Deux
phenomena.brief_description: Psychiatric condition where delusional beliefs are transmitted between individuals

phenomena.name: Aswang
phenomena.brief_description: A shape-shifting vampire or werewolf creature from Philippine folklore.

phenomena.name: Black Eyed Children
phenomena.brief_description: Paranormal entities appearing as children with entirely black eyes who request entry to homes.

phenomena.name: Jor≈çgumo
phenomena.brief_description: A 400-year-old orb weaver spider that shapeshifts into a woman from Japanese folklore.

phenomena.name: Jumbee
phenomena.brief_description: A spiritual demon or ghost from Caribbean folklore.

phenomena.name: Krasue
phenomena.brief_description: A Thai creature consisting of a woman's head with dangling intestines.

phenomena.name: Kuchisake-onna
phenomena.brief_description: A modern Japanese urban legend about a woman with a surgically enlarged mouth.

phenomena.name: La Llorona
phenomena.brief_description: A ghostly mother from Mexican folklore who drowned her children and cries eternally.

phenomena.name: Lougarou
phenomena.brief_description: A werewolf-like creature from Caribbean and Haitian folklore.

phenomena.name: Loup-garou
phenomena.brief_description: A French werewolf that transforms at night and feeds on blood.

phenomena.name: Mananagal
phenomena.brief_description: A Philippine creature that separates its upper torso and grows bat wings.

phenomena.name: Pontianak
phenomena.brief_description: The vengeful spirit of a woman who died during pregnancy from Southeast Asian folklore.

phenomena.name: Raven Mocker
phenomena.brief_description: A creature from Cherokee mythology that mocks with raven cries.

phenomena.name: Rolling Calf
phenomena.brief_description: A demonic rolling calf creature from Caribbean folklore that terrorizes people.

phenomena.name: Soucouyant
phenomena.brief_description: A Caribbean shapeshifter that sheds skin at night becoming a fiery skeleton.

phenomena.name: Tiyanak
phenomena.brief_description: A vampire creature from Filipino folklore that appears as a crying baby.

phenomena.name: Yuki-onna
phenomena.brief_description: A malevolent snow spirit from Japanese folklore appearing as a beautiful woman.
